Name: William
Text: Alright Advisor, we're ready to advance.

Name: William
Text: With the parking lot liberated, we now have Mecha-Equipment.

Name: William
Text: One of the units, the Mecha-Stapler is an indirect unit. In order to attack, it can't move.

Name: William
Text: But it has the benefit of being able to attack at range. If you hold cancel (X on the keyboard or right click) ontop of the unit, you will see what tiles it can attack.

Name: William
Text: Take your time and check the range on all of our new equipment. The finance leader is counting on us!

Name: William
Text: We're up against indirect units as well. Check the range of the enemies before making your move. Our troops and equipment are itching to go, but we should excercise caution.

Name: William
Text: Let's move out! University is counting on us!

Name: Kronk
Text: Spread out. Kronk stay at manor. Kronk use BIG STAPLER to attack. Enemies won't know what him them!

Name: Kronk
Text: Kronk show Finance Leader that Kronk the strongest.
